ADHD: Inattention carelessness hyperactivity executive dysfunction disinhibition emotional dysregulation impulsivity impaired working memory
AIDS Related Wasting: Early : Flu-like illness Later : Large lymph nodes , fever, weight loss
Abnormal Uterine Bleeding: Irregular, abnormally frequent, prolonged, or excessive amounts of uterine bleeding
Acetaminophen Overdose: Early : Non specific, feeling tired, abdominal pain , nausea Later : Yellowish skin , blood clotting problems , confusion
Acne: Blackheads, whiteheads , pimples , oily skin, scarring
Actinic Keratosis: Hard lump with a scaly top or ulceration .
Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia: Feeling tired, pale color, fever, easy bleeding or bruising, bone pain, enlarged lymph nodes
Acute Nonlymphocytic Leukemia: Feeling tired, shortness of breath , easy bruising and bleeding, increased risk of infection
Acute Promyelocytic Leukemia: Feeling tired, shortness of breath , easy bruising and bleeding, increased risk of infection
Addison's Disease: Abdominal pain, weakness, weight loss, darkening of the skin
Adrenocortical Insufficiency: Abdominal pain, weakness, weight loss, darkening of the skin
Agitated State: False beliefs , seeing or hearing things that others do not see or hear , incoherent speech and behavior
Alcohol Dependence: Drinking large amounts of alcohol over a long period, difficulty cutting down, acquiring and drinking alcohol taking up a lot of time, usage resulting in problems, withdrawal occurring when stopping
Alcohol Withdrawal: Anxiety , shakiness , sweating, vomiting, fast heart rate , mild fever
Allergic Reactions: Red eyes , itchy rash, vomiting, runny nose , shortness of breath , swelling, sneezing , and cough.
Allergic Rhinitis: Stuffy itchy nose, sneezing , red, itchy, and watery eyes, swelling around the eyes, itchy ears
Allergies: Red eyes , itchy rash, vomiting, runny nose , shortness of breath , swelling, sneezing , and cough.
Alopecia: Loss of hair from part of the head or body.
Alpha-1 Proteinase Inhibitor Deficiency: Shortness of breath , wheezing , yellowish skin
Alzheimer's Disease: Memory loss , problems with language , disorientation , mood swings
Anal Fissure and Fistula: Abdominal pain , fever , nausea , diarrhea , constipation , blood in the stool
Anal Itching: White patches or vaginal discharge, itching
Androgenetic Alopecia: Areas of hair loss , usually on the scalp
Anemia: Feeling tired , pale skin , weakness, shortness of breath , feeling faint
Anemia Associated with Chronic Renal Fai: Early : None Later : Leg swelling , feeling tired, vomiting , loss of appetite, confusion
Anemia, Chemotherapy Induced: pale skin , fatigue , fast heart rate , rash , dizziness , headache , frequent or prolonged infections , nosebleeds , bleeding gums, prolonged bleeding from cuts, unexplained or easy bruising, hematoma
Anemia, Sickle Cell: Attacks of pain, anemia , swelling in the hands and feet , bacterial infections , stroke
Angina: Fever, pain, a raised tongue, trouble swallowing, neck swelling
Angina Pectoris Prophylaxis: Decreased ability to exercise, loss of consciousness , shortness of breath , heart related chest pain , leg swelling
Anorexia: Fear of gaining weight, strong desire to be thin, food restrictions , body image disturbance
Anthrax: Skin form : small blister with surrounding swelling Inhalational form : fever, chest pain, shortness of breath Intestinal form : nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, abdominal pain Injection form : fever, abscess
Antiphospholipid Syndrome: Painful and swollen joints , fever , chest pain , hair loss , mouth ulcers , swollen lymph nodes , feeling tired , red rash
Anxiety and Stress: Disturbing thoughts, feelings, or dreams related to the event; mental or physical distress to trauma-related cues; efforts to avoid trauma-related situations; increased fight-or-flight response
Aplastic Anemia: pale skin , fatigue , fast heart rate , rash , dizziness , headache , frequent or prolonged infections , nosebleeds , bleeding gums, prolonged bleeding from cuts, unexplained or easy bruising, hematoma
Arrhythmia: Palpitations , dizziness or lightheadedness , passing out , shortness of breath , chest pain , decreased level of consciousness
Asperger Syndrome: Problems with social interaction and nonverbal communication, restricted interests, and repetitive behavior
Aspergillosis, Aspergilloma: Weight loss, cough, shortness of breath, haemoptysis , fatigue, malaise, chest pain, sputum production, fever
Asthma: Recurring episodes of wheezing , coughing , chest tightness , shortness of breath
Asthma, Maintenance: Recurring episodes of wheezing , coughing , chest tightness , shortness of breath
Asthma, acute: Anxiety, panic, laboring to breath, tightened neck and chest muscles , difficulty performing normal daily activities
Atrial Fibrillation: None, heart palpitations , fainting , shortness of breath , chest pain
Atrophic Vaginitis: Pain with sex , vaginal itchiness or dryness, an urge to urinate
Autism: Difficulties in social interaction , verbal and nonverbal communication , and the presence of repetitive behavior or restricted interests
Autoimmune Hepatitis: Often asymptomatic , fatigue , right upper abdominal pain , anorexia , nausea , jaundice , joint pain , rash
B12 Nutritional Deficiency: Decreased ability to think, feeling tired , depression , irritability, abnormal sensations , changes in reflexes
Bacterial Vaginitis: Vaginal discharge that often smells like fish, burning with urination
Basal Cell Carcinoma: Painless raised area of skin that may be shiny with small blood vessel running over it or ulceration
Behcet's Disease: Mouth sores , genital sores, inflammation of the eye, arthritis , chronic fatigue
Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia: Frequent urination, trouble starting to urinate, weak stream, inability to urinate , loss of bladder control
Bladder Infection: Pain with urination , frequent urination, feeling the need to urinate despite having an empty bladder
Bone infection: Pain in a specific bone, overlying redness, fever , weakness
Breast Cancer, Adjuvant: Lump in the testicle , swelling or pain in the scrotum
Breast Cancer, Metastatic: A lump in a breast, a change in breast shape, dimpling of the skin, fluid from the nipple , a newly inverted nipple, a red scaly patch of skin on the breast
Breast Cancer, Palliative: Lump, abnormal bleeding, prolonged cough, unexplained weight loss , change in bowel movements
Breast Cancer, Prevention: A lump in a breast, a change in breast shape, dimpling of the skin, fluid from the nipple , a newly inverted nipple, a red scaly patch of skin on the breast
Bronchitis: Coughing up mucus , wheezing , shortness of breath , chest discomfort
Bronchospasm Prophylaxis: Shortness of breath on vigorous exercise
Bulimia: Eating a large amount of food in a short amount of time followed by vomiting or the use of laxatives , often normal weight
Burns, External: First degree : Red without blisters Second degree : Blisters and pain Third degree : Area stiff and not painful Fourth degree : Bone and tendon loss
Bursitis: Swelling , redness , and pain at the tip of the elbow
COPD, Acute: Coughing up mucus , wheezing , shortness of breath , chest discomfort
Cachexia: sudden weight loss, altered eating signals
Cataplexy: Excessive daytime sleepiness , involuntary sleep episodes, sudden loss of muscle strength , hallucinations
Cerebral Spasticity: Poor coordination Stiff or loose muscles Weak muscles Tremors
Cervical Dystonia: Breaks in the voice making a person difficult to understand
Chlamydia Infection: None, vaginal discharge , discharge from the penis, burning with urination
Chronic Fatigue Syndrome: Worsening of symptoms with activity , long-term fatigue , others
Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia: Early : None Later : Non-painful lymph nodes swelling, feeling tired, fever, weight loss
Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia: Bleeding, bruising , fatigue , fever, increased risk of infections
Chronic Myofascial Pain: Pain lasts longer than the expected period of recovery.
Chronic Pain: Pain lasts longer than the expected period of recovery.
Chronic Spasticity: Breaks in the voice making a person difficult to understand
Clostridial Infection: Severe pain , fever , purple colored skin in the affected area
Cluster Headaches: Recurrent, severe headaches on one side of the head, eye watering, stuffy nose
Cold Sores: Burning pain followed by small blisters or sores
Cold Symptoms: Cough , sore throat , runny nose , fever
Condylomata Acuminata: Small bumps in skin of genital area, varying sizes and shapes but typically protrude out, burning, itch
Constipation: Infrequent or hard to pass bowel movements , abdominal pain, bloating
Constipation, Acute: Infrequent or hard to pass bowel movements , abdominal pain, bloating
Constipation, Chronic: Infrequent or hard to pass bowel movements , abdominal pain, bloating
Constipation, Drug Induced: Infrequent or hard to pass bowel movements , abdominal pain, bloating
Corneal Refractive Surgery: Distorted or blurred vision at all distances, eyestrain , headaches
Cough and Nasal Congestion: Thick nasal mucus, plugged nose, pain in the face, fever, sore throat, frequent attacks of cough
Crohn's Disease: Abdominal pain , diarrhea (may be bloody), fever , weight loss , fatigue , mouth sores, reduced appetite
Crohn's Disease, Acute: Abdominal pain , diarrhea (may be bloody), fever , weight loss , fatigue , mouth sores, reduced appetite
Crohn's Disease, Maintenance: Abdominal pain , diarrhea (may be bloody), fever , weight loss , fatigue , mouth sores, reduced appetite
Cutaneous Candidiasis: White patches or vaginal discharge, itching
Cutaneous T-cell Lymphoma: swollen lymph nodes , fevers , enlarged liver or spleen, liver dysfunction , rash
Cyclitis: Headaches, red eyes, blurred vision, photophobia, burning and redness of the eye
Cystic Fibrosis: Difficulty breathing , coughing up mucus , poor growth , fatty stool
Dandruff: Itchy and flaking skin of the scalp
Deep Neck Infection: Fever, pain, a raised tongue, trouble swallowing, neck swelling
Deep Vein Thrombosis: Pain, swelling , redness, enlarged veins in the affected limb
Deep Vein Thrombosis Prophylaxis after H: Pain, swelling , redness, enlarged veins in the affected limb
Deep Vein Thrombosis, First Event: Pain, swelling , redness, enlarged veins in the affected limb
Deep Vein Thrombosis, Prophylaxis: Pain, swelling , redness, enlarged veins in the affected limb
Deep Vein Thrombosis, Recurrent Event: Pain, swelling , redness, enlarged veins in the affected limb
Depression: Low mood, aversion to activity, loss of interest, loss of feeling pleasure
Dermatologic Lesion: Painless red flat papules on palms and soles.
Dermatological Disorders: Red (purple on darker skin), itchy, scaly patches of skin
Dermatomyositis: Rash, muscle weakness, weight loss, fever
Dermatophytosis: Red, itchy, scaly, circular skin rash
Diabetes Insipidus: Large amounts of dilute urine, increased thirst
Diabetes, Type 1: Frequent urination , increased thirst , increased hunger , weight loss , blurred vision , fatigue and weakness , Bed-wetting in children who previously didn't wet the bed during the night
Diabetes, Type 2: Increased thirst , frequent urination , unexplained weight loss , increased hunger
Diabetic Kidney Disease: Albuminuria , peripheral edema , high blood pressure, tiredness
Diabetic Macular Edema: Often asymptomatic, but can cause spots in the eye and vision loss.
Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy: Shooting pain , numbness , tingling, tremors, bladder problems, unsteadiness
Diverticulitis: Abdominal pain , fever , nausea , diarrhea , constipation , blood in the stool
Dry Eye Disease: Dry eyes, irritation, redness , discharge, blurred vision
Dry Skin: Low skin moisture, itching , scaling , skin cracking
Dumping Syndrome: Diarrhea; fever; abdominal pain, abdominal bloating; nutrient deficiencies
Dysautonomia: Anhidrosis or hyperhidrosis , blurry vision , tunnel vision , orthostatic hypotension , constipation , diarrhea , dysphagia , bowel incontinence , urinary retention or urinary incontinence , dizziness , Brain Fog , exercise intolerance , tachycardia , vertigo , weakness and pruritus .
Dystonia: Breaks in the voice making a person difficult to understand
Edema: Skin which feels tight, area may feel heavy
Ehrlichiosis: Fever, chills, severe headaches, muscle aches, nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, loss of appetite, confusion, and splotchy or pinpoint rash. More severe symptoms include brain or nervous system damage, respiratory failure, uncontrollable bleeding, organ failure, and death.
Endometrial Hyperplasia: Vaginal bleeding , pain with urination or sexual intercourse , pelvic pain
Enterocolitis: Poor feeding, bloating, decreased activity, vomiting of bile
Eosinophilic Esophagitis: difficulty swallowing , heartburn , abdominal pain , food bolus obstruction
Epididymitis, Sexually Transmitted: Pain in the back of the testicle , swelling of the testicle, burning with urination , frequent urination
Epilepsy: Periods of loss of consciousness, abnormal shaking, staring, change in vision, mood changes and/or other cognitive disturbances
Erectile Dysfunction: Inability to gain or maintain an erection
Extrapyramidal Reaction: Blood in stool Weight loss Nausea Vomiting Diarrhea Stomach pain
Eye Redness: Photophobia , hot/prickly/gritty sensation in eye, Eye redness without pain, Watery eyes
GERD: Taste of acid, heartburn , bad breath , chest pain , breathing problems
Gallbladder Disease: None, crampy pain in the right upper abdomen
Gastritis/Duodenitis: Upper abdominal pain , nausea , vomiting , bloating, loss of appetite, heartburn
Gastrointestinal Decontamination: Early : Non specific, feeling tired, abdominal pain , nausea Later : Yellowish skin , blood clotting problems , confusion
Gastrointestinal Hemorrhage: Vomiting red blood , vomiting black blood , bloody stool , black stool , feeling tired
Gastroparesis: Nausea , vomiting , abdominal pain , feeling full after eating just a few bites
Gender Dysphoria: Distress related to one's assigned gender, sex, and/or sex characteristics
Giant Cell Tumor of Bone: Swelling, pain, sensitivity, and/or limited range of motion
Giardiasis: Diarrhea , abdominal pain , weight loss, nausea
Gingivitis: pain , bad breath , fever , bleeding gums

Glioblastoma Multi: A lump in a breast, a change in breast shape, dimpling of the skin, fluid from the nipple , a newly inverted nipple, a red scaly patch of skin on the breast
Glioblastoma Multiforme: Initially nonspecific, headaches , personality changes, nausea , symptoms similar to a stroke
Gonococcal Infection, Uncomplicated: Pain with urination , frequent urination, feeling the need to urinate despite having an empty bladder
HIV Infection: Early : Flu-like illness Later : Large lymph nodes , fever, weight loss
Hashimoto's disease: Painless goiter , weight gain , feeling tired , constipation , depression , dry skin , hair loss
Head Injury: Injury to the brain or skull
Head Lice: Itching that can result in trouble sleeping
Headache: Recurrent, severe headaches on one side of the head, eye watering, stuffy nose
Heart Attack: Chest pain , shortness of breath , nausea/vomiting, dizziness or lightheadedness , cold sweat , feeling tired ; arm, neck, back, jaw, or stomach pain, decreased level or total loss of consciousness
Heart Failure: Shortness of breath , exhaustion , swollen legs
Helicobacter Pylori Infection: Upper abdominal pain , nausea , vomiting , bloating, loss of appetite, heartburn
Hemorrhoids: Internal : Painless, bright red rectal bleeding External : Pain and swelling around the anus
Hepatic Encephalopathy: Altered level of consciousness , mood changes, personality changes, movement problems slurred speech, Sleep problems, Anxiety or irritability, Muscle twitches (myoclonus), Difficulty concentrating or short attention span, Flapping hand motion (asterixis), Reduced alertness, Cognitive impairment (confused thinking or judgment).
Hepatitis B: None, yellowish skin , tiredness , dark urine, abdominal pain
Hepatocellular Carcinoma: Lump or pain in the right side below the rib cage , swelling of the abdomen , yellowish skin , easy bruising, weight loss, weakness
Herbal Supplementation: Headache , vomiting , feeling tired , trouble sleeping , dizziness
Herpes Simplex: Blisters that break open and form small ulcers , fever, swollen lymph nodes
Herpes Simplex Dendritic Keratitis: Headaches, red eyes, blurred vision, photophobia, burning and redness of the eye
Herpes Simplex, Mucocutaneous/Immunocomp: White patches or vaginal discharge, itching
Blisters that break open and form small ulcers , fever, swollen lymph nodes
Herpes Simplex, Suppression: None, small blisters that break open to form painful ulcers , flu-like symptoms
Herpes Zoster, Prophylaxis: Small, itchy blisters , headache , loss of appetite , tiredness , fever
Hidradenitis Suppurativa: Multiple inflamed and swollen skin lesions
Hirsutism: Irregular menstrual periods , heavy periods , excess hair , acne , pelvic pain, difficulty getting pregnant , patches of thick, darker, velvety skin
Hot Flashes: No menstrual periods for a year
Hypercalcemia of Malignancy: Abdominal pain , bone pain, confusion , depression , weakness
Hyperekplexia: Increased startle response to sudden auditory, visual, or tactile stimulation
Hyperhidrosis: Excessive sweating after eating certain foods by individuals with particular nerve damage
Hyperkalemia: Palpitations , muscle pain , muscle weakness , numbness
Hyperphosphatemia of Renal Failure: Early : None Later : Leg swelling , feeling tired, vomiting , loss of appetite, confusion
Hypersomnia: Excessive daytime sleepiness , involuntary sleep episodes, sudden loss of muscle strength , hallucinations
Hypogonadism, Male: Absent or delayed puberty , infertility , inability to smell
Hypokalemic Periodic Paralysis: Awareness but an inability to move during waking or falling asleep hallucinations
Hypotension: Dizziness , clumsiness , giddiness , headaches, lightheadedness , fatigue , nausea, blurred vision, shakiness, breathlessness, increased thirst, irregular heartbeat, chest pain, fever, seizures
Hypothyroidism, After Thyroid Removal: Poor ability to tolerate cold, feeling tired, constipation , weight gain, depression , anxiety , irritability
ICU Agitation: Agitation , confusion , drowsiness , hallucinations , delusions , memory problems
Idiopathic Thrombocytopenic Purpura: Large bruises , fever , weakness, shortness of breath , confusion, headache
Infection Prophylaxis: None, burning with urination , vaginal discharge , discharge from the penis , pelvic pain , testicular pain
Inflammatory Bowel Disease: Abdominal pain , diarrhea (may be bloody), fever , weight loss , fatigue , mouth sores, reduced appetite
Influenza: Fever , runny nose , sore throat , muscle pain , headache , coughing , fatigue
Influenza Prophylaxis: Fever , runny nose , sore throat , muscle pain , headache , coughing , fatigue
Insomnia: Trouble sleeping , daytime sleepiness, low energy, irritability, depressed mood
Insomnia, Stimulant-Associated: Progressive insomnia, ataxia, double vision, weight loss, high blood pressure, excessive sweating
Intermittent Claudication: Pain, tingling, tiredness, weakness, numbness or heaviness in the legs, hips, glutes and lower back .
Interstitial Cystitis: Chronic pain of the bladder, feeling the need to urinate right away , needing to urinate often , pain with sex
Intraocular Hypertension: .mw-parser-output .hlist dl,.mw-parser-output .hlist ol,.mw-parser-output .hlist ul{margin:0;padding:0}.mw-parser-output .hlist dd,.mw-parser-output .hlist Iritis: Headaches, red eyes, blurred vision, photophobia, burning and redness of the eye
Iron Deficiency Anemia: Feeling tired , weakness, shortness of breath , confusion, pallor
Ischemic Stroke: Inability to move or feel on one side of the body, problems understanding or speaking , dizziness , loss of vision to one side
Ischemic Stroke, Prophylaxis: Headache, nausea, vomiting, decreased consciousness, seizures
Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis: Joint pain , stiffness, redness, swelling , decreased range of motion
Keratitis: Eye pain, blurred vision , red eye, eye discharge, photophobia , corneal ulceration
Keratoconjunctivitis Sicca: Dry eyes, irritation, redness , discharge, blurred vision
Keratosis: Firmly attached white patch on a mucous membrane , changes with time
Kidney Infections: Fever , flank tenderness , nausea , burning with urination , frequent urination
Labor Induction: Missed periods, tender breasts, nausea and vomiting , hunger, frequent urination
Lactose Intolerance: Abdominal pain, bloating , diarrhea , flatulence , nausea
Left Ventricular Dysfunction: Shortness of breath , exhaustion , swollen legs
Lennox-Gastaut Syndrome: Periods of loss of consciousness, abnormal shaking, staring, change in vision, mood changes and/or other cognitive disturbances
Lichen Planus: Thick leathery skin, exaggerated skin markings, small bumps , patches, scratch marks , scale
Lichen Sclerosus: Thick leathery skin, exaggerated skin markings, small bumps , patches, scratch marks , scale
Lipodystrophy: Mild specific body features, absence of subcutaneous fat , muscle hypertrophy , insulin resistance , gigantism / acromegaly , large appetite
Local Anesthesia: Pain especially with coughing, bulging area
Lyme Disease: Expanding area of redness at the site of a tick bite, fever , headache , tiredness
Lyme Disease, Erythema Chronicum Migrans: Expanding area of redness at the site of a tick bite, fever , headache , tiredness
Lyme Disease, Neurologic: Expanding area of redness at the site of a tick bite, fever , headache , tiredness
Lymphoma: Enlarged lymph nodes , fever , sweats , unintended weight loss, itching , feeling tired
Macular Degeneration: Blurred or no vision in the center of the visual field
Macular Edema: Often asymptomatic, but can cause spots in the eye and vision loss.
Mantle Cell Lymphoma: Enlarged lymph nodes , fever , sweats , unintended weight loss, itching , feeling tired
Melanoma: Mole that is increasing in size, has irregular edges, change in color, itchiness, or skin breakdown .
Melanoma, Metastatic: Mole that is increasing in size, has irregular edges, change in color, itchiness, or skin breakdown .
Melasma: Abdominal pain, weakness, weight loss, darkening of the skin
Meniere's Disease: Feeling like the world is spinning , ringing in the ears , hearing loss , fullness in the ear
Menopausal Disorders: No menstrual periods for a year
Migraine: Headaches , nausea , sensitivity to light , sound , and smell
Migraine Prevention: Headaches , nausea , sensitivity to light , sound , and smell
Mild Cognitive Impairment: Can include memory impairments (amnestic) or cognitive problems like impaired decision making, language, or visuospatial skills (non-amnestic)
Mitral Valve Prolapse: Palpitations , atypical precordial pain, dyspnea on exertion, low BMI , electrocardiogram abnormalities ( ventricular tachycardia ), syncope , low blood pressure , headaches, lightheadedness, other signs suggestive of autonomic nervous system dysfunction ( dysautonomia )
Mixed Connective Tissue Disease: dry eyes, dry mouth, haïr lost, joint inflammation, joint pain, mouth ulcers, positive ANA test, raynaud's phenomenon, sun-sensitive rash, ...
Mononucleosis: Fever , sore throat, enlarged lymph nodes in the neck, fatigue
Motion Sickness: Nausea , vomiting , cold sweat, increased salivation
Mountain Sickness / Altitude Sickness: Headache , vomiting , feeling tired , trouble sleeping , dizziness
Mucositis: Red burn-like sores or ulcers throughout the mouth
Multiple Sclerosis: Variable, including almost any neurological symptom or sign, with autonomic , visual, motor, and sensory problems being the most common.
Muscle Pain: Buttock pain that is worse with sitting
Muscle Spasm: fever , cramped-up jaw, muscle spasms , headache , seizures , sweating, and trouble swallowing
Myasthenia Gravis: Varying degrees muscle weakness , double vision , drooping eyelids , trouble talking, trouble walking
Mycoplasma Pneumonia: Cough, shortness of breath , chest pain, fever
Myelodysplastic Syndrome: None, feeling tired , shortness of breath , easy bleeding , frequent infections
Myelofibrosis: Fatigue , insomnia , migraines , headache , and dizziness .
Myotonia Congenita: Delayed relaxation of muscles, falls, difficulty swallowing
Narcolepsy: Excessive daytime sleepiness , involuntary sleep episodes, sudden loss of muscle strength , hallucinations
Nasal Carriage of Staphylococcus aureus: Localized breast pain and redness, fever
Nasal Polyps: Trouble breathing through the nose, loss of smell , decreased taste, post nasal drip , runny nose
Neck Pain: Neck pain , occipital neuralgia , numbness or tingling in the tongue.
Nephrotic Syndrome: Swelling , weight gain, feeling tired, foamy urine
Neuralgia: Typical : episodes of severe, sudden, shock-like pain in one side of the face that lasts for seconds to minutes Atypical : constant burning pain
Neuropathic Pain: Shooting pain , numbness , tingling, tremors, bladder problems, unsteadiness
Neutropenia: Fever , malaise , inflammation and infection of oral mucosa, respiratory tract, digestive tract, skin, and abdominal pain
Neutropenia Associated with Chemotherapy: None, feeling tired , shortness of breath , easy bleeding , frequent infections
New Daily Persistent Headache: Headaches , nausea , sensitivity to light , sound , and smell
Night Terrors: feelings of panic or dread, sudden motor activity, thrashing, sweating, rapid breathing, increased heart rate
Nocturnal Leg Cramps: sudden muscle pain and a paralysis-like immobility
Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma: Enlarged lymph nodes , fever , night sweats , weight loss , tiredness , itching
Non-Small Cell Lung Cance: Feeling tired, pale color, fever, easy bleeding or bruising, bone pain, enlarged lymph nodes
Nonoccupational Exposure: Early : Flu-like illness Later : Large lymph nodes , fever, weight loss
Obstructive Sleep Apnea/Hypopnea Syndrom: Pauses breathing or periods of shallow breathing during sleep , snoring , tired during the day
Occipital Neuralgia: Recurrent, severe headaches on one side of the head, eye watering, stuffy nose
Onychomycosis, Fingernail: White or yellow nail discoloration, thickening of the nail
Onychomycosis, Toenail: White or yellow nail discoloration, thickening of the nail
Ophthalmic Surgery: Distorted or blurred vision at all distances, eyestrain , headaches
Opiate Adjunct: Strong desire to use opioids, increased tolerance to opioids, failure to meet obligations, trouble with reducing use, withdrawal syndrome with discontinuation
Opiate Dependence: Strong desire to use opioids, increased tolerance to opioids, failure to meet obligations, trouble with reducing use, withdrawal syndrome with discontinuation
Opiate Withdrawal: Strong desire to use opioids, increased tolerance to opioids, failure to meet obligations, trouble with reducing use, withdrawal syndrome with discontinuation
Opioid-Induced Constipation: Infrequent or hard to pass bowel movements , abdominal pain, bloating
Oral Thrush: White patches or vaginal discharge, itching
Organ Transplant, Rejection Reversal: Frequent urination , increased thirst , increased hunger , weight loss , blurred vision , fatigue and weakness , Bed-wetting in children who previously didn't wet the bed during the night
Osteoarthritis: Joint pain , stiffness, joint swelling , decreased range of motion
Osteoporosis: Increased risk of a broken bone
Otitis Externa: Ear pain , swelling of the ear canal, decreased hearing , difficulty chewing
Ovarian Cysts: None, bloating, lower abdominal pain, lower back pain
Pancreatic Cance: Frequent urination , increased thirst , increased hunger , weight loss , blurred vision , fatigue and weakness , Bed-wetting in children who previously didn't wet the bed during the night
Pancreatic Exocrine Dysfunction: Pain in the upper abdomen nausea vomiting fever fatty stool
Parkinson's Disease: Rigidity , slowness of movement , tremor , difficulty walking
Parkinsonism: Rigidity , slowness of movement , tremor , difficulty walking
Pelvic Inflammatory Disease: Lower abdominal pain, vaginal discharge , fever , burning with urination , pain with sex , irregular menstruation
Pemphigus: Rashes and blisters on the skin, could be painful to the touch with a possibility of acantholysis, erythema and hyperkeratosis.
Perimenopausal Symptoms: No menstrual periods for a year
Period Pain: Pain during first few days of menstruation , diarrhea, nausea
Periodontitis: Red, swollen, painful, bleeding gums, loose teeth, bad breath
Peripheral Neuropathy: Shooting pain , numbness , tingling, tremors, bladder problems, unsteadiness
Peritonitis: Severe pain, swelling of the abdomen, fever
Pertussis Prophylaxis: fever , cramped-up jaw, muscle spasms , headache , seizures , sweating, and trouble swallowing
Pharyngitis: Sore throat , fever , runny nose, cough , headache, hoarse voice
Pityriasis rubra pilaris: Single red and slightly scaly area, followed
Plaque Psoriasis: Red (purple on darker skin), itchy, scaly patches of skin
Pneumococcal Disease Prophylaxis: Attacks of pain, anemia , swelling in the hands and feet , bacterial infections , stroke
Pneumonia: Cough, shortness of breath , chest pain, fever
Polycystic Ovary Syndrome: Irregular menstrual periods , heavy periods , excess hair , acne , pelvic pain, difficulty getting pregnant , patches of thick, darker, velvety skin
Post-Cholecystectomy Diarrhea: None, crampy pain in the right upper abdomen
Postherpetic Neuralgia: burning or stabbing pain, pain doesn't end after the shingles subsides.
Postmenopausal Symptoms: No menstrual periods for a year

Postpartum Depression: Extreme sadness, low energy , anxiety , changes in sleeping or eating patterns, crying episodes, irritability
Postural Orthostatic Tachycardia Syndrom: More often with standing: lightheadedness , trouble thinking , tachycardia , weakness, palpitations , heat intolerance , acrocyanosis
Premature Ventricular Depolarizations: Palpitations , dizziness or lightheadedness , passing out , shortness of breath , chest pain , decreased level of consciousness
Premenstrual Syndrome: Fatigue , irritability and other mood changes, tender breasts , abdominal bloating
Prevention of Bladder infection: Pain with urination , frequent urination, feeling the need to urinate despite having an empty bladder
Prevention of Cardiovascular Disease: Chest pain , shortness of breath , fatigue , loss of consciousness
Prevention of Hypokalemia: Decreased level or total loss of consciousness , abnormal or no breathing , no pulse
Prevention of Osteoporosis: Increased risk of a broken bone
Prevention of Thromboembolism in Atrial: None, heart palpitations , fainting , shortness of breath , chest pain
Primary Hyperaldosteronism: High blood pressure , poor vision, headaches , muscular weakness, muscle spasms
Primary Immunodeficiency Syndrome: Early : Flu-like illness Later : Large lymph nodes , fever, weight loss
Pruritus: Compulsion to scratch an irritated area of skin
Pseudobulbar Affect: Episodes of uncontrollable laughing, crying, or other emotional displays that may not match the patient's mental state
Pseudotumor Cerebri: Headache , vision problems, ringing in the ears with the heartbeat
Psoriasis: Red (purple on darker skin), itchy, scaly patches of skin
Psoriatic Arthritis: Joint pain , stiffness, redness, swelling , decreased range of motion
Psychosis: False beliefs , seeing or hearing things that others do not see or hear , incoherent speech and behavior
Pudendal Neuralgia: pain, tingling, dull ache, numbness, shooting pain, muscle weakness
Pulmonary Edema: Progressive dyspnea, cough, fever, cyanosis, tachycardia
Pulmonary Embolism: Shortness of breath , chest pain , coughing up blood
Pulmonary Embolism, First Event: Shortness of breath , chest pain , coughing up blood
Raynaud's Syndrome: An affected part turning white , then blue , then red, burning
Reflex Sympathetic Dystrophy Syndrome: Pain , allodynia , hypo - or hyperesthesia , skin temperature abnormalities, atrophy , stiffness
Renal Cell Carcinoma: Blood in the urine , lump in the abdomen , back pain
Restless Legs Syndrome: Unpleasant feeling in the legs that briefly improves with moving them
Rhinitis: Stuffy itchy nose, sneezing , red, itchy, and watery eyes, swelling around the eyes, itchy ears
Rhinorrhea: clear, colourless liquid draining from nose
Rosacea: Facial redness , swelling , and small and superficial dilated blood vessels
Sarcoidosis: Depends on the organ involved Lungs : wheezing , cough, shortness of breath , chest pain Skin : lumps, ulcers, discolored skin Children : weight loss, bone pain, feeling tired
Schizophrenia: Hallucinations (usually hearing voices ), delusions , social isolation , flat affect , confused thinking
Schnitzler Syndrome: Urticaria , angioedema , headache , fatigue , joint pain or swelling , gastrointestinal symptoms flushing , wheezing , and palpitations .
Sciatica: Pain going down the leg from the lower back , weakness or numbness of the affected leg
Seborrheic Dermatitis: Flaking, dry or greasy, red, itchy, and inflamed skin
Secondary Hyperparathyroidism: None, kidney stones , weakness, depression, bone pains, confusion, increased urination
Sexual Dysfunction, SSRI Induced: Inability to gain or maintain an erection
Sinusitis: Thick nasal mucus, plugged nose, pain in the face, fever, sore throat, frequent attacks of cough
Sjogren's Syndrome: Dry mouth , dry eyes , other areas of dryness
Skin Rash: Rash, muscle weakness, weight loss, fever
Skin or Soft Tissue Infection: Severe pain , fever , purple colored skin in the affected area
Spondylolisthesis: Pain, numbness, or weakness in the low back, buttocks, or legs typically worsened with prolonged walking or standing and relieved with sitting or lying down
Squamous Cell Carcinoma: Hard lump with a scaly top or ulceration .
Status Epilepticus: Regular pattern of contraction and extension of the arms and legs, movement of one part of the body, unresponsive
Steroid Responsive Inflammatory Conditio: Abdominal pain , diarrhea mixed with blood , weight loss , fever , anemia , dehydration , loss of appetite, fatigue , sores on the skin, urgency to defecate, inability to defecate despite urgency, rectal pain
Strep Throat: Fever, sore throat, enlarged lymph nodes
Streptococcal Infection: Fever, sore throat, enlarged lymph nodes
Strongyloidiasis: abdominal pain , diarrhea , weight loss , itching and rash
Subarachnoid Hemorrhage: Severe headache of rapid onset , vomiting , decreased level of consciousness
Supraventricular Tachycardia: Palpitations , feeling faint, sweating, shortness of breath , chest pain .
Swine Flu: Fever , runny nose , sore throat , muscle pain , headache , coughing , fatigue
Syringomyelia: Missing collarbone , prominent forehead, flat nose, shorter
Systemic Lupus Erythematosus: Painful and swollen joints , fever , chest pain , hair loss , mouth ulcers , swollen lymph nodes , feeling tired , red rash
Systemic Mastocytosis: Feeling tired, shortness of breath , easy bruising and bleeding, increased risk of infection
Systemic Sclerosis: An affected part turning white , then blue , then red, burning
TSH Suppression: Painless goiter , weight gain , feeling tired , constipation , depression , dry skin , hair loss
Thrombocythemia: Fatigue , insomnia , migraines , headache , and dizziness .
Thyroid Cance: Frequent urination , increased thirst , increased hunger , weight loss , blurred vision , fatigue and weakness , Bed-wetting in children who previously didn't wet the bed during the night
Thyrotoxicosis: Irritability, muscle weakness, sleeping problems, fast heartbeat , heat intolerance , diarrhea , enlargement of the thyroid , weight loss
Tinea Pedis: Itching, scaling, redness of the foot
Tinnitus: Hearing sound when no external sound is present
Tonsillitis/Pharyngitis: Sore throat , fever , enlargement of the tonsils, trouble swallowing, large lymph nodes around the neck
Topical Disinfection: Red skin , burning sensation, desquamation, itchiness
Traveler's Diarrhea: Unformed stool while traveling, fever, abdominal cramps, headache
Trichomoniasis: Itching in the genital area , bad smelling thin vaginal discharge , burning with urination, pain with sex
Trigeminal Neuralgia: Typical : episodes of severe, sudden, shock-like pain in one side of the face that lasts for seconds to minutes Atypical : constant burning pain
Tuberculosis, Latent: Chronic cough , fever , cough with bloody mucus , weight loss
Tympanostomy Tube Placement Surgery: Micrognathia , glossoptosis , obstruction of the upper airway , sometimes cleft palate
Ulcerative Colitis: Abdominal pain , diarrhea mixed with blood , weight loss , fever , anemia , dehydration , loss of appetite, fatigue , sores on the skin, urgency to defecate, inability to defecate despite urgency, rectal pain
Ulcerative Colitis, Active: Abdominal pain , diarrhea mixed with blood , weight loss , fever , anemia , dehydration , loss of appetite, fatigue , sores on the skin, urgency to defecate, inability to defecate despite urgency, rectal pain
Ulcerative Colitis, Maintenance: Abdominal pain , diarrhea mixed with blood , weight loss , fever , anemia , dehydration , loss of appetite, fatigue , sores on the skin, urgency to defecate, inability to defecate despite urgency, rectal pain
Ulcerative Proctitis: Abdominal pain , diarrhea mixed with blood , weight loss , fever , anemia , dehydration , loss of appetite, fatigue , sores on the skin, urgency to defecate, inability to defecate despite urgency, rectal pain
Underactive Thyroid: Poor ability to tolerate cold, feeling tired, constipation , weight gain, depression , anxiety , irritability
Undifferentiated Connective Tissue Disea: dry eyes, dry mouth, haïr lost, joint inflammation, joint pain, mouth ulcers, positive ANA test, raynaud's phenomenon, sun-sensitive rash, ...
Upper Limb Spasticity: Poor coordination Stiff or loose muscles Weak muscles Tremors
Upper Respiratory Tract Infection: Inability to move the facial muscles on one side, change in taste , pain around the ear
Urinary Incontinence: Frequent feeling of needing to urinate , incontinence
Urinary Retention: Sudden onset : Inability to urinate, low abdominal pain Long term : Frequent urination, loss of bladder control, urinary tract infection
Urinary Tract Infection: Pain with urination , frequent urination, feeling the need to urinate despite having an empty bladder
Urinary Tract Stones: Severe pain in the lower back or abdomen, blood in the urine, vomiting, nausea
Uterine Bleeding: Irregular, abnormally frequent, prolonged, or excessive amounts of uterine bleeding
Uveitis: Headaches, red eyes, blurred vision, photophobia, burning and redness of the eye
Vaginal Yeast Infection: Vaginal itching, burning with urination , white and thick vaginal discharge , pain with sex, redness around the vagina
Ventricular Arrhythmia: Palpitations , dizziness or lightheadedness , passing out , shortness of breath , chest pain , decreased level of consciousness
Ventricular Fibrillation: Cardiac arrest with loss of consciousness and no pulse
Vitamin B12 Deficiency: Decreased ability to think, feeling tired , depression , irritability, abnormal sensations , changes in reflexes
Vitamin/Mineral Supplementation and Defi: Decreased ability to think, feeling tired , depression , irritability, abnormal sensations , changes in reflexes
Warts: skin growth usually occurring on the hands, feet, or genitals
Wolff-Parkinson-White Syndrome: Abnormally fast heartbeat , palpitations , shortness of breath , lightheadedness, loss of consciousness
Women (oxybutynin): Chronic pain of the bladder, feeling the need to urinate right away , needing to urinate often , pain with sex
Xerostomia: Redness , skin breakdown and crusting at the corner of the mouth
Yellow Fever Prophylaxis: Fever , multiple painful joints , involuntary muscle movements , erythema marginatum
Zollinger-Ellison Syndrome: Heartburn , upper abdominal pain , nausea , belching , vomiting , blood in the stool , weight loss , weight gain , bloating , loss of appetite , yellowing of the skin and whites of the eyes , difficulty swallowing
